 2008-00552008-01-29,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of FAYE HELEN SMITH of Gloucester, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year; and designation of FAYE HELEN SMITH as Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada; effective May 30, 2008.
